comment: I wasn't gonna say anything but you brought it up. We as consumers have a lot of power but we never seem to organize enough to use it. Please watch the corporations that take the bail out money from Covid-19, any company that fires employees, does not cover medical costs, buys back their own stock....one word BOYCOTT!  If Heard is in this movie I won't see it and I hope the other actors are paid a flat scale and aren't profit sharing because I hate colteral damage but I don't think it'll kill any of them. Most of the CEO's of these corporations make Heard look like a decent human being, now that's saying a lot.  Please, please pay attention and take back the power, if a company sucks don't reward them with your money...they really think we're too stupid to get together and make a difference. Let's show them how wrong they are!
